page.title: 15TOURISM I
page.content: It is great for tourists to come to Powfoot in the summer,because it is very hot. In Powfoot the sea is very warm in summer.Lots of people swim in the sea, and lie in the sun.The sea is very quick at coming in and there is a deep channel. The tourists (who I call touroids because they bug me) come in the summer. Many people stay in the Golf Hotel or caravans. There is an old swimming pool out on the sand.It is split in half one side for women and one for men. You can not swim in it any more because there are lots of shells in the bottom,that jag your feet.
